content.text: I really enjoy spending time with my pets and working on cars.
What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat, both are very important to me.
I love cats! What's your cat's name?
His name is Oliver, he's a very sweet cat.
I have a brown and curly hair too! Are you a teacher by any chance?
Yes, I'm a teacher! I love helping kids learn and grow.
That's awesome! I'm a stay at home mom with a toddler. It's a lot of work but it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine! I'm glad to hear you're enjoying being a stay at home mom.
Thanks! It's not always easy but it's definitely worth it.
I'm sure it is! How old is your toddler?
He's 16 months old. He's learning so much new stuff every day.
That's amazing! I love watching kids learn and grow.
Me too! It's the best part of being a parent.
